divs: sighting detailsfive people viewed a sighting at an eastlake residence on the lake erie shore. the object went up and down gradually and was a large sphere 1" - 1 1\4" in diameter as seen from the observation point. at one point it went higher than the moon and dissipated. the object did not travel horizontally. on this night the moon was waxing and lake erie was calm. no boats were seen. caller, a teacher, was 15 feet above husband who was fishing on shore with 2 1\2 year old child. caller thought it was a cargo ship and didn't pay attention to it for a few minutes. object was white, with pinkish green colors on the bottom. husband saw something entirely different. a tunnel effect, like smoke or and columns and didn't see lights but a cloud, a pole at ground level that went straight up to the moon. n one knew what created the swirling effect seen by husband. caller thought object was 50 miles out . there was a screech sound about 10 minutes after the sighting. it was not their baby who was asleep. it may have been another baby, although the godmother of that child did not hear a screech and was nearer than the other witnesses to the second baby. this bothered the caller, but the caller is not discounting one of the babies made the noise. sphere was observed for 8-10 minutes. caller doesn���t know how many times it went up and down. weather was clear, dark. nothing else happened. no other effects except goose bumps.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Eastlake
There were no other sightings in Eastlake on or around June 7th 2008
